alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 25 at 3:39AM EST until December 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures may drop to 32 degrees this morning. * WHERE...Primarily northern and western Glades County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
